text: @GOP @SecretaryRoss And with the haphazard re-opening of America many more people will be come sick and die. The only way @realDonaldTrump can think of reducing COVID-19 numbers is NOT TO REPORT THEM!?!?! He will have a lot to answer for when he is ousted from office!
